class.name: com.krishagni.rbac.domain.Group
class.sql-query: select ROLES.IDENTIFIER as ROLE_ID from RBAC_GROUP_ROLES GRP join RBAC_ROLES ROLES on GRP.ROLE_ID = ROLES.IDENTIFIER join RBAC_ROLE_ACCESS_LIST ACL on ACL.ROLE_ID = ROLES.IDENTIFIER join RBAC_ROLE_ACCESS_LIST_OPS RLOPS on RLOPS.ACL_ID = ACL.IDENTIFIER join RBAC_RESOURCES RES on RES.IDENTIFIER = ACL.RESOURCE_ID join RBAC_OPERATIONS OPS on RLOPS.OPERATION_ID = OPS.IDENTIFIER where (OPS.NAME = :operationName or OPS.NAME = 'ALL') and (RES.NAME = :resourceName or RES.NAME = 'ALL') and (GRP.DSO_ID = :dsoId or GRP.DSO_ID = -1) and GRP.GROUP_ID = :groupId and RLOPS.RES_OBJ_ID = :resourceInstanceId
